title: A Survey of Reinforcement Learning for Large Reasoning Models
summary: This paper surveys recent advances in Reinforcement Learning (RL) for reasoning with Large Language Models (LLMs). It highlights RL's success in addressing complex logical tasks and its role in transforming LLMs into LRMs, while also discussing foundational challenges in computation.
